text: Bimalendra Nidhi (Maithili/Nepali/Devanagari: बिमलेन्द्र निधि ); is the former Deputy Prime Minister of Nepal and Minister of Home Affairs of Nepal. He is the present vice-president of Nepali Congress, the governing party of the Nepal. == References == Category:1956 births Category:Nepali Congress politicians Category:Living people Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of Nepal Category:Government ministers of Nepal Category:Nepalese Hindus
title: Bimalendra Nidhi
